    Description
    BackClassAdapter
    This class is an adapter that implements the JsonDeserializer and JsonSerializer interfaces for the CardBack class.
    FrontClassAdapter
    Adapter for deserializing the class CardFront.
    GsonTranslater
    The GsonTranslater class is responsible for translating Java objects into JSON string representation using Gson library.
    ListResourcesEnumAdapter
    Adapter for deserializing a list of the type List.
    MapRequirementsAdapter
    Adapter for deserializing a map of the type Map<Resources, Integer>.
    ObjectiveAdapter
    The ObjectiveAdapter class implements the JsonDeserializer and JsonSerializer interfaces to deserialize and serialize Objective objects.
    ObjectiveCardAdapter
    This class is an adapter for serializing and deserializing ObjectiveCard objects to and from JSON using Gson library.
    PlayableCardAdapter
    This class is an adapter that implements the JsonSerializer and JsonDeserializer interfaces for the PlayableCard class.
    PlayAreaAdapter
    The PlayAreaAdapter class implements the JsonSerializer and JsonDeserializer interfaces to serialize and deserialize a LinkedHashMapinvalid input: '<'Point, PlayableCard> object to and from JSON.
    ResourceEnumAdapter
    This class is a JsonSerializer implementation for the Resources enum.
